title: Blue Ivy adorably rocks super long braids as she joins Beyonce
text:
Girls’ shopping trip! (Picture: Backgrid)

Beyonce’s seven-year-old daughter Blue Ivy continues to steal the show as she rocked some long braids this week.

We cannot handle the cuteness.

The youngster, who has definitely inherited the superstar gene from her famous parents, was seen with the fresh hairstyle this week during a shopping trip.

The duo was out and about in Beverly Hills treating themselves big after a massive year, with 38-year-old Bey keeping a watchful eye over Blue as they ducked out of the shopping centre.

While the young one – who recently showed off her impressive singing chops – strode on ahead of Beyonce, her superstar mother trying to keep a low profile in a grey hoodie and matching jeans.

Still terribly chic, we must add, because it’s Queen Bey. Us? We couldn’t pull this off without looking like a hermit who needed a little sunlight.

This is way too cute (Picture: BACKGRID)

Beyonce went under the radar (Picture: BACKGRID)

Sneaking out of Barneys New York, Beyonce’s long blonde hair peeked out from under her hood as she kept her hands in her pockets.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Beyonce and her daughter with Jay Z, 49, are a tight couple, a formidable force in the entertainment industry as Bey recently attempted to trademark her name.

Last month it was allegedly argued by Beyonce that her offspring Blue Ivy was a ‘cultural icon’ as she fought to protect her little girl’s moniker.

Beyonce and Bey are tight (Picture: Invision)

Blue is already making a name for herself in the cultural arena, after lending her vocals to Beyonce’s Lion King-inspired album The Gift, singing on Brown Skinned Girl on the Lion King soundtrack.

Footage released for the behind-the-scenes documentary for the making of saw an adorable moment between Bey and her eldest as they worked on the melody and lyrics together.

She then got a helping hand from mum as she pumped out the tunes, with Beyonce holding the lyrics up in front of the microphone.

‘She’s quite talented for a little girl,’ a source previously told HollywoodLife about Blue’s tune.

‘She’s very outgoing, so it wouldn’t be surprising if she decided to get more into singing and dancing.’
